layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x75
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x75
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x59
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0

  LayoutListBox {SELECT} at (0,0.25) size 352x58.75 [bgcolor=#FFFFFF] [border: (1px solid #999999)]

      LayoutText {#text} at (2,0) size 7x13
